items.content_html: Blocks distracting spotlight overlays on websites to keep you focused. Simple, lightweight, and easy to use.
items.title: tejazmali/spotlight-blocker-extention: Blocks distracting spotlight overlays on websites to keep you focused. Simple, lightweight, and easy to use.

items.content_html: A lightweight, type-safe translation library for React that simplifies internationalization (i18n) with TypeScript. Supports lazy loading, automatic generation of locale files, and string interpolation with compile-time safety. Designed for React applications to minimize boilerplate and maximize flexibility.
items.title: Rustling-Pines/typesafe-translator-react: A lightweight, type-safe translation library for React that simplifies internationalization (i18n) with TypeScript. Supports lazy loading, automatic generation of locale files, and string interpolation with compile-time safety. Designed for React applications to minimize boilerplate and maximize flexibility.

items.content_html: A highly customizable, lightweight Vue 3 carousel component for your next awesome project.
items.title: ismail9k/vue3-carousel: A highly customizable, lightweight Vue 3 carousel component for your next awesome project.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A lightweight state machine implementation for Zustand state management. This library provides a simple yet powerful way to manage complex state transitions with features like guards, reducers, middleware, and hierarchical states.
items.title: exidz/zustand-fsm: A lightweight state machine implementation for Zustand state management. This library provides a simple yet powerful way to manage complex state transitions with features like guards, reducers, middleware, and hierarchical states.

items.content_html: node-csv-miniDB is a Node.js library designed to simplify CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on CSV files. Utilizing the built-in fs module, this lightweight and efficient wrapper provides an intuitive interface for managing CSV data as a mini database.
items.title: Tunmiseoni/node-csv-miniDB: node-csv-miniDB is a Node.js library designed to simplify CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on CSV files. Utilizing the built-in fs module, this lightweight and efficient wrapper provides an intuitive interface for managing CSV data as a mini database.

items.content_html: This middleware helps to restrict the number of requests a client can make within a given time period. It's ideal for lightweight use cases and can be easily extended with in-memory, Redis, or MongoDB, Memcached as storage options. https://www.npmjs.com/package/@canmertinyo/rate-limit-express
items.title: c4nzin/rate-limiter-express: This middleware helps to restrict the number of requests a client can make within a given time period. It's ideal for lightweight use cases and can be easily extended with in-memory, Redis, or MongoDB, Memcached as storage options. https://www.npmjs.com/package/@canmertinyo/rate-limit-express

items.content_html: Agentic Browser Automation is a lightweight JavaScript solution for automating web tasks. It extracts form fields, integrates LLM-backed recommendations, and dynamically fills and submits forms. Versatile and efficient, it simplifies workflows like surveys or registrations, saving time and improving accuracy. MIT Licensed.
items.title: sharmilli/AgenticWebAutomation: Agentic Browser Automation is a lightweight JavaScript solution for automating web tasks. It extracts form fields, integrates LLM-backed recommendations, and dynamically fills and submits forms. Versatile and efficient, it simplifies workflows like surveys or registrations, saving time and improving accuracy. MIT Licensed.
